revised_title: Further Observations on the Organisation of Fossil Plants of the Coal-Measures: Calamites, Calamostachys, and Sphenophyllum
tldr: This paper presents detailed observations and analysis of the organization and structure of fossil plants from the coal measures, specifically Calamites, Calamostachys, and Sphenophyllum. The authors investigate the vegetative structures, growth patterns, and reproductive systems of these plants, providing insights into their evolution and classification.
